excerpt: Pearl is a journal that visualizes & synthesizes your life, through career challenges, moments of daily gratitude, and more. View your emotion graph, weekly reflection, and use tab to continue, all in one beautiful, intuitive experience.

Free

Pearl is a journal that visualizes & synthesizes your life, through career challenges, moments of daily gratitude, and more. View your emotion graph, weekly reflection, and use tab to continue, all in one beautiful, intuitive experience.
